title: Joe Rogan Endorses Trump on Election Eve After Journey from Bernie Sanders Support
summary: Joe Rogan endorses Donald Trump for president through Elon Musk interview, completing political evolution from 2020 Bernie Sanders supporter to Trump endorser, influencing millions of young male voters

sources.title: Joe Rogan endorses Trump after Elon Musk interview
Rogan completes journey from Bernie to Trump

notes: Rogan endorsed Bernie Sanders in 2020. After $450M in Spotify deals, shifted right. Most influential podcaster globally. Reaches 14.5M per episode. Key to Trump's young male voter strategy.
